content.raw: /atlas/get_joint_damping is OK for reading the damping from the Atlas' joints but this service should be called for reading the damping of the sandia hand joint/s. If I'm not wrong it should be /sandia_hands/get_joint_damping . I've confirmed that the service call exists :) (and should be symmetric with the next ros service description in this paragraph).
content.html: /atlas/get_joint_damping is OK for reading the damping from the Atlas' joints but this service should be called for reading the damping of the sandia hand joint/s. If I'm not wrong it should be /sandia_hands/get_joint_damping . I've confirmed that the service call exists :) (and should be symmetric with the next ros service description in this paragraph).
